SUMMARY: Three 2020 voters said they regret voting for President Joe Biden, citing the economic downturn. They also said the Democratic Party made false promises.

SUMMARY: Republican Gov. Larry Hogan of Maryland will barnstorm through first presidential primary state of New Hampshire this week, where he’ll showcase a new inflation relief plan

SUMMARY: Democrats and Republicans tell Fox News Digital what Biden needs to do if he wants to stop GOP from winning control of Congress in the November midterm elections.

TITLE: DHS anticipates an average of 441 unaccompanied children per day at border this year, a new record
SUMMARY: President Joe Biden's Department of Homeland Security expects a record number of unaccompanied minors to cross the border this year, setting the minimum at 148,000.

TITLE: Trump offers scathing rebuke of Elon Musk during Alaska rally with Sarah Palin: 'He’s another bull---- artist'
SUMMARY: Former President Donald Trump rebuked Elon Musk during a rally in Anchorage, Alaska, where he also endorsed U.S. Senate candidate Kelly Tshibaka and congressional candidate Sarah Palin.

SUMMARY: Arizona has banned residents from recording video while standing within eight feet of any police activity. Critics argue the bill gives police far to much authority.

TITLE: NY lawmakers approve one-time cash payment to senior citizens
SUMMARY: A New York county legislature approved a one-time $200 cash payment to eligible senior citizens, citing their fixed income during a time of high inflation.

SUMMARY: Sen. Dick Durbin argued that other senators may see tragedies similar to that of Highland Park in their own states if they don't work to pass meaningful gun legislation.

SUMMARY: The Senate passed a sweeping bipartisan gun bill late Thursday night in a 65-33 vote. The bill now heads to the House.

SUMMARY: Longtime Trump ally Steve Bannon is now willing to testify before the Jan. 6 committee after the former president waived executive privilege.

SUMMARY: Senate Majority Leader Chuck Schumer has tested positive for COVID-19 and will work remotely as the Senate convenes this week.

TITLE: $15M in American Rescue Plan funds went to ‘anti-racism,’ ‘social activism’ programs for kids

SUMMARY: With Republicans aiming to take back the Senate in the November midterms, Democrats face a six-month dash to confirm as many federal judges as possible.

SUMMARY: First lady Jill Biden faced ridicule from Hispanic Republicans on Monday after news broke she would be headlining a "Latinx IncluXion Luncheon" in Texas.

SUMMARY: Democratic gubernatorial nominee Beto O’Rourke next week will launch an ambitious 49-day campaign swing across Texas, as he challenges two-term Republican Gov. Greg Abbott.

TITLE: Biden gun control speech interrupted by father of Parkland shooting victim
